## FormStateBinding type

Represents a setter for a given output with selected state as input

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FormStateBinding<TState, TSlice extends string, TOutput> = {
    props: TSlice[];
    setter: FormStateBindingSetter<TState, TSlice, TOutput>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [FormStateBindingSetter](./dynamic-forms.formstatebindingsetter.md)
